content: **crocheted hat in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with relief-stitches ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-210 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l fits head size approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-200 g colour 37 misty forest **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
